languages.text: "Старшим офицерам станции, говорит капитан. Мы запросили помощь у наследника Винтерскейла, однако не стоит уповать на чудо — что-то глушит передачу, сообщение осталось без ответа, а может, и вовсе не дошло. Мы сами по себе, так что оставайтесь бдительны. Предателем может оказаться любой — слышите меня? ЛЮБОЙ! При малейшем подозрении приказываю вести огонь на поражение".

traits.locale_text: "Старшим офицерам станции, говорит капитан. Мы запросили помощь у наследника Винтерскейла, однако не стоит уповать на чудо — что-то глушит передачу, сообщение осталось без ответа, а может и вовсе не дошло. Мы сами по себе, так что оставайтесь бдительны. Педателем может оказаться любой — слышите меня? ЛЮБОЙ! При малейшем подозрении приказываю вести огонь на поражение".

languages.text: "Senior station officers, this is the captain speaking. We attempted to contact the Winterscale scion for help, but something is jamming the signal. We never received a reply and cannot be sure it was even sent in the first place. A rescue team is not coming. We are on our own, so remain vigilant. Anyone could be a traitor, you hear me? ANYONE! If you are in doubt, shoot to kill."
languages.original_text: "Старшим офицерам станции, говорит капитан. Мы запросили помощь у наследника Винтерскейла, однако не стоит уповать на чудо — что-то глушит передачу, сообщение осталось без ответа, а может, и вовсе не дошло. Мы сами по себе, так что оставайтесь бдительны. Предателем может оказаться любой — слышите меня? ЛЮБОЙ! При малейшем подозрении приказываю вести огонь на поражение".

traits.locale_text: "Senior station officers, this is captain speaking. We called the Winterscale scion for help, but the rescue will not be coming — something is jamming the signal, we never received a reply and cannot be sure it was even sent in the first place. We are on our own, so remain vigilant. Anyone can be a traitor, you hear me? ANYONE! If you are in doubt, shoot to kill. Best to be safe than sorry."

"Senior station officers, this is captain speaking. We called the Winterscale scion for help, but the rescue will not be coming — something is jamming the signal, we never received a reply and cannot be sure it was even sent in the first place. We are on our own, so remain vigilant. Anyone can be a traitor, you hear me? ANYONE! If you are in doubt, shoot to kill. Best to be safe than sorry."

If you are in doubt, shoot to kill."

We never received a reply and cannot be sure it was even sent in the first place. A rescue team is not coming. We are on our own, so remain vigilant. Anyone could be a traitor, you hear me? ANYONE! If you are in doubt, shoot to kill."

"Senior station officers, this is the captain speaking. We attempted to contact the Winterscale scion for help, but something is jamming the signal. We never received a reply and cannot be sure it was even sent in the first place. A rescue team is not coming. We are on our own, so remain vigilant. Anyone could be a traitor, you hear me? ANYONE! If you are in doubt, shoot to kill."

languages.text: «Oficiales superiores de la estación, os habla el capitán. Hemos intentado ponernos en contacto con el descendiente de los Winterscale para solicitar su ayuda, pero hay interferencias en la señal. No hemos recibido respuesta y no estamos seguros de que el mensaje se haya enviado. No va a llegar ningún equipo de rescate. Estamos solos, así que tened cuidado, pues cualquiera podría ser un traidor, ¿de acuerdo? ¡CUALQUIERA! Si dudáis, disparad a matar».
languages.original_text: "Senior station officers, this is the captain speaking. We attempted to contact the Winterscale scion for help, but something is jamming the signal. We never received a reply and cannot be sure it was even sent in the first place. A rescue team is not coming. We are on our own, so remain vigilant. Anyone could be a traitor, you hear me? ANYONE! If you are in doubt, shoot to kill."

traits.locale_text: «Oficiales superiores de la estación, os habla el capitán. Hemos intentado ponernos en contacto con el descendiente de los Winterscale para solicitar su ayuda, pero hay interferencias en la señal. No hemos recibido respuesta y no estamos seguros de que el mensaje se haya enviado. No va a llegar ningún equipo de rescate. Estamos solos, así que tened cuidado, pues cualquiera podría ser un traidor, ¿de acuerdo? ¡CUALQUIERA! Si dudáis, disparad a matar».

languages.text: "Hochrangige Stationsoffiziere, hier spricht der Captain. Wir haben versucht, den Winterzunder-Sprössling zu kontaktieren, um Hilfe anzufordern, doch das Signal wird gestört. Wir haben keine Antwort erhalten und können nicht sicher sein, ob unsere Nachricht überhaupt verschickt wurde. Es wird kein Rettungsteam kommen. Wir sind auf uns allein gestellt, also bleibt wachsam. Jeder kann ein Verräter sein, verstanden? JEDER! Im Zweifelsfall erst schießen, dann fragen."
languages.original_text: "Senior station officers, this is the captain speaking. We attempted to contact the Winterscale scion for help, but something is jamming the signal. We never received a reply and cannot be sure it was even sent in the first place. A rescue team is not coming. We are on our own, so remain vigilant. Anyone could be a traitor, you hear me? ANYONE! If you are in doubt, shoot to kill."

traits.locale_text: "Hochrangige Stationsoffiziere, hier spricht der Captain. Wir haben versucht, den Winterzunder-Sprössling zu kontaktieren, um Hilfe anzufordern, doch das Signal wird gestört. Wir haben keine Antwort erhalten und können nicht sicher sein, ob unsere Nachricht überhaupt verschickt wurde. Es wird kein Rettungsteam kommen. Wir sind auf uns allein gestellt, also bleibt wachsam. Jeder kann ein Verräter sein, verstanden? JEDER! Im Zweifelsfall erst schießen, dann fragen."

languages.text: « À tous les officiers supérieurs de la station, ici votre capitaine. Nous avons tenté de contacter le descendant des Winterscale pour qu'il nous aide, mais le signal est brouillé. Nous n'avons reçu aucune réponse et ne sommes pas en mesure d'affirmer que le message initial a bien été envoyé. Personne ne viendra nous sauver. Nous sommes livrés à nous-mêmes, alors restez sur vos gardes. Tout le monde pourrait être un traître, vous m'entendez ? TOUT LE MONDE ! Dans le doute, tirez pour tuer. »
languages.original_text: "Senior station officers, this is the captain speaking. We attempted to contact the Winterscale scion for help, but something is jamming the signal. We never received a reply and cannot be sure it was even sent in the first place. A rescue team is not coming. We are on our own, so remain vigilant. Anyone could be a traitor, you hear me? ANYONE! If you are in doubt, shoot to kill."

traits.locale_text: « À tous les officiers supérieurs de la station, ici votre capitaine. Nous avons tenté de contacter le descendant des Winterscale pour qu'il nous aide, mais le signal est brouillé. Nous n'avons reçu aucune réponse et ne sommes pas en mesure d'affirmer que le message initial a bien été envoyé. Personne ne viendra nous sauver. Nous sommes livrés à nous-mêmes, alors restez sur vos gardes. Tout le monde pourrait être un traître, vous m'entendez ? TOUT LE MONDE ! Dans le doute, tirez pour tuer. »

languages.text: “各位高阶军官，我是舰长。我们试图联系温特斯凯尔的后裔寻求帮助，但有什么东西干扰了信号。我们一直都没有得到答复，也确定不了信号究竟有没有发送出去。救援人员恐怕是来不了了，我们只能靠自己了。请保持警惕，每个人都可能是叛徒，听到了吗？每个人！如有怀疑，格杀勿论。”
languages.original_text: "Senior station officers, this is the captain speaking. We attempted to contact the Winterscale scion for help, but something is jamming the signal. We never received a reply and cannot be sure it was even sent in the first place. A rescue team is not coming. We are on our own, so remain vigilant. Anyone could be a traitor, you hear me? ANYONE! If you are in doubt, shoot to kill."

traits.locale_text: “各位高阶军官，我是舰长。我们试图联系温特斯凯尔的后裔寻求帮助，但有什么东西干扰了信号。我们一直都没有得到答复，也确定不了信号究竟有没有发送出去。救援人员恐怕是来不了了，我们只能靠自己了。请保持警惕，每个人都可能是叛徒，听到了吗？每个人！如有怀疑，格杀勿论。”

languages.text: 「ステーションの上級士官の諸君、こちらは船長だ。ウィンタースケールの後継者に救難信号を出そうとしたところ、何かの妨害が入った。一度も返事は届いておらず、そもそも信号が送信されたかも分からない。救助隊は来ない。自力でどうにかしなくてはならないので、警戒を怠るな。裏切り者は誰なのかわからないんだからな。わからないんだよ！だから、迷ったら撃ち殺せ」
languages.original_text: "Senior station officers, this is the captain speaking. We attempted to contact the Winterscale scion for help, but something is jamming the signal. We never received a reply and cannot be sure it was even sent in the first place. A rescue team is not coming. We are on our own, so remain vigilant. Anyone could be a traitor, you hear me? ANYONE! If you are in doubt, shoot to kill."

traits.locale_text: 「ステーションの上級士官の諸君、こちらは船長だ。ウィンタースケールの後継者に救難信号を出そうとしたところ、何かの妨害が入った。一度も返事は届いておらず、そもそも信号が送信されたかも分からない。しかも、救助隊は来ない。我々でどうにかするしかないので、気をつけて欲しい。誰でも裏切り者になり得るってことだからな。誰でもだ！だから、迷ったら撃ち殺せ」
「ステーションの上級士官の諸君、こちらは船長だ。ウィンタースケールの後継者に救難信号を出そうとしたところ、何かの妨害が入った。一度も返事は届いておらず、そもそも信号が送信されたかも分からない。救助隊は来ない。自力でどうにかしなくてはならないので、警戒を怠るな。裏切り者は誰なのかわからないんだからな。わからないんだよ！だから、迷ったら撃ち殺せ」

languages.text: "Kıdemli istasyon subayları, kaptan konuşuyor. Yardım için Winterscale hanesiyle irtibata geçmeye çalıştık ama bir şey sinyali engelliyor. Yanıt almadık, mesajın gittiğine bile emin olamıyoruz. Kurtarma ekibi gelmeyecek, kendi başımızayız. Bu yüzden uyanık olun. Herkes hain olabilir, duydunuz mu? HERKES! Şüpheniz varsa ateş serbest."
languages.original_text: "Senior station officers, this is the captain speaking. We attempted to contact the Winterscale scion for help, but something is jamming the signal. We never received a reply and cannot be sure it was even sent in the first place. A rescue team is not coming. We are on our own, so remain vigilant. Anyone could be a traitor, you hear me? ANYONE! If you are in doubt, shoot to kill."

traits.locale_text: "Kıdemli istasyon subayları, kaptan konuşuyor. Yardım için Winterscale hanesiyle irtibata geçmeye çalıştık ama bir şey sinyali engelliyor. Yanıt almadık, mesajın gittiğine bile emin olamıyoruz. Kurtarma ekibi gelmeyecek, kendi başımızayız. Bu yüzden uyanık olun. Herkes hain olabilir, duydunuz mu? HERKES! Şüpheniz varsa ateş serbest."
